thread.title: Please Help Me Save My Potbelly Pig Olive 🐷🐖
thread.title_full: Please Help Me Save My Potbelly Pig Olive 🐷🐖

title: Please Help Me Save My Potbelly Pig Olive 🐷🐖
text:
target: The City of New Carlisle, New Carlisle, OH 
I recieved a zoning violation for my potbelly pig that we have had for almost 2 years. She is kept in our house and is litter trained. She does go outside in our backyard that has a privacy fence. She is very loving and friendly and most of all a member of our loving family.
